start.text: Hippity hop~! The rabbits have come to graze the grass!
Just leave it to the Rabbit Team!

start_boss.text: *Sigh* I'm not a fan of such dry grass. We'll graze it just the same, Rabbits.

out_of_missiles.text: That's the last of our ammo. Pff, like I need it!
Out of missiles. There's still a lot of grass left to graze!

engaged.text: The bastards in the fringe would be tougher than this!

need_help.text: Oh, those crazy asses- A little help?

pursuing.text: Let's graze the rest of em' and go back!

running.text: Too dangerous to graze. We'll pull back for a minute.

hull_90.text: That won't stop us from grazing!

hull_50.text: Am expedition to the fringe might've been more fun...

hull_30.text: There's still so much grass to graze! We can't stop now!

overload.text: Not good. We'll graze them as soon as we recover.

death.text: Khrf... Hahaha... I let my guard down...
I guess I'll never graze... Another grassland...

victory.text: That was a lot of grass to graze. Nice work, Rabbit Team.

victory_boss.text: Phew~ That was tiring. Shall we go back now?
